Class DBReaderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.knime.core.node.port.database.reader.DBReaderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DBReader

    public class DBReaderImpl
extends Object
implements DBReader

        Read data from database.
        Specified by:
        createTable in interface DBReader
        Parameters:
        exec - used for progress info
        cp - CredentialsProvider providing user/password
        useDbRowId - true if the row id returned by the database should be used to generate the KNIME row id
